title: Hard brought up: child welfare story
brief_description: Shows public services available in one US community for answering social problems. When two boys rob a service station, they are brought before the juvenile court. A social worker investigates their family circumstances.
description: Shows public services available in one US community for answering social problems. When two boys rob a service station, they are brought before the juvenile court. A social worker investigates their family circumstances.
